title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Nicole Arbour | 1/15/21
description:
LeeAnn Miller, owner of pro-America apparel outlet PatrioticMe, joins after Facebook banned her from advertising. Bill O’Reilly talks President Trump’s second impeachment and more of the week’s top stories. Comedian Nicole Arbour talks Cosmopolitan’s new magazine covers promoting obesity as “healthy," the Capitol riot, and whether she gave Glenn COVID-19.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

LeeAnn Miller, owner of pro-America apparel outlet PatrioticMe, joins after Facebook banned her from advertising. Bill O’Reilly talks President Trump’s second impeachment and more of the week’s top stories. Comedian Nicole Arbour talks Cosmopolitan’s new magazine covers promoting obesity as “healthy," the Capitol riot, and whether she gave Glenn COVID-19.
